thread.title: J P Duminy out of ODIs after sustaining hand injury
thread.title_full: J P Duminy out of ODIs after sustaining hand injury

author: Wires English | Press Trust of India
title: J P Duminy out of ODIs after sustaining hand injury
text:
Comments 
New Delhi, Oct 19: The South African team management suffered a blow today after senior batsman JP Duminy was ruled out of the remaining two ODI matches against India. (Also Read: Virender Sehwag announces retirement from International cricket) 
According to a tweet from official handle of Cricket South Africa, “Duminy sustained a laceration to his right hand during the third ODI. Will need 2-3 weeks to recover. #IndvSA” 
Dean Elgar called up to replace Duminy in ODI squad.South Africa are slated to play the next ODI in Chennai on October 22.
